carpet.rule.deepslateInstaminable.desc: Deepslate is instaminable with efficiency 5 and haste 2
carpet.rule.endstoneInstaminable.desc: Endstone is instaminable with efficiency 5 and haste 2
carpet.rule.endermanNoGrief.desc: Endermans will not attempt to pick up any block
carpet.rule.villagersNoGenerateGolems.de: Disable generation of iron golems by villagers
carpet.rule.stackeableTotemsSize.desc: Limit the amount of stacking in the rule stackeableTotems
carpet.rule.carefulBreak.desc: Places the mined block in the player inventory while never/always/sneaking/no-sneaking
